meanings.sent1: My nannas always bake delicious cookies for me.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my nannas during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: My nannas tell the best bedtime stories.
meanings.sent4: The wisdom of my nannas is a treasure.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of my nannas fills our home with joy.

meanings.definition: A type of fruit, also known as bananas
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating nannas with my breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent2: Nannas are a great source of potassium.
meanings.sent3: I packed a nannas in my lunch for a healthy snack.
meanings.sent4: The smoothie recipe calls for ripe nannas.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh nannas fills the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for a grandmother or elderly woman
meanings.sent1: My nannas always gives the warmest hugs.
meanings.sent2: I cherish the memories I have with my nannas.
meanings.sent3: My nannas is the queen of our family gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The love in my nannas' eyes is priceless.
meanings.sent5: The kindness of my nannas knows no bounds.
